name: Surprise Toys Dolls Airport
description:
"Dream Airport games 2018", such as **Airport Manager Games: Flight Attendant Simulator**,
are easy and interesting simple games for everyone whose dream job is to be flight attendants when they grow up.
Airport simulator games is the best choice if you’re looking for interesting games with many levels!
Features
High quality visuals and sound effects!
Choose a flight attendant you want to play as!
Enjoy 7 different but equally exciting mini games at the airport and on the plane!
Check-in passengers, X-ray luggage, wash the airplane and more!
